name: Helpcare AI
headline: AI Workers for Healthcare Orgs to Find, Call & Schedule More Patients.
description:
Helpcare builds AI Workers for healthcare orgs to take on coordination burden from staff and reduce time of care by autonomously identifying and outreaching patients (through phone, text, email, & mail) to schedule visits, book screenings, complete pre-post, and onboard. 

These agents require no integration, can navigate all tools, speak 29 languages, come with 50+ outreach scripts and have a remarkable 80% conversation-to-booking closing rate.

founders.name: Huzaifa Sial, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CEO of Helpcare AI.

Huzaifa has a Masters in Clinical Informatics form Northwestern and has spent 14+ yrs building Healthcare AI solutions like disease prediction, DME optimization, patient engagement, care delivery search and behavioral engines for care gap closures, for some of the largest Payers & Providers. He has authored 4 Health AI Patents.

Previously, Huzaifa led AI Solutions @ United Healthcare & Optum and was part of 2 healthcare AI exits.

founders.name: Ayush Tomar, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO of Helpcare AI.

Ayush has spent 10+ yrs as an ML scientist and software engineer building recommendation engines and search algorithms. As a Director of AI/ML Engineering at UnitedHealth Group, Ayush created products that helped patients take positive actions to manage their health and find the best doctors for their care needs. Authored 14 healthcare ML patents.

generated_description:
### Helpcare AI: Streamlining Patient Outreach with AI 

**Overview**  
Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch F24, Helpcare AI is pioneering the use of artificial intelligence in healthcare operations. Its primary mission is to serve healthcare organizations by enhancing their ability to find, call, and schedule more patients through intelligent automation.

**What They Do**  
Helpcare AI develops AI workers specifically designed for healthcare. These AI-powered assistants alleviate the coordination burden on human staff, autonomously reaching out to patients via phone, text, email, and mail. Their features include:

- **Language Proficiency**: The AI workers are multilingual, capable of communicating in **29 languages**.
- **Integration-Free Operation**: They require no complex integration processes, allowing them to work seamlessly with existing systems.
- **Scripted Outreach**: Equipped with over **50 outreach scripts**, these AI agents can handle a variety of scenarios.
- **High Conversion Rates**: They boast an impressive **80% conversation-to-booking closing rate**, dramatically improving the efficiency of patient scheduling.

**Current Capacities**  
Helpcare AI currently manages a substantial number of healthcare processes:
- **1,108 EMR systems**
- **2,637 payor interactions**
- **801 referrals**
- **Over 2,000 scheduled visits**

Their innovative approach not only schedules appointments but also actively works on identifying care gaps and enhancing operational efficiency. 

**Team and Leadership**  
With an undisclosed number of employees, Helpcare AI is led by a proficient team that includes Group Partner **Nicolas Dessaigne**. The company's strategic direction is influenced by its founders, who've learned from significant organizations such as UnitedHealthcare and Amazon, bringing valuable experience to the startup.

**Why It Matters**  
In an era where patient engagement and operational efficiency are more crucial than ever, Helpcare AI's autonomous systems represent a potential game-changer for healthcare providers. By leveraging AI to boost outreach capabilities, they help healthcare organizations navigate the complexities of patient scheduling and care management more effectively.

**Get Involved**  
To learn more or schedule a demo, head to their website: [Helpcare AI](https://helpcare.ai). The company is currently running a limited beta program, encouraging healthcare organizations to assess whether their services can fit into their operational model. 

In short, Helpcare AI is not just about filling slots in appointment calendarsâ€”it's about transforming the way that healthcare interacts with patients, with the potential to redefine the future of care management.
